Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QMainWindow

Class that handles the UI for the single drone version of the app.

__init__()[source]

Set Up the UI

load_widgets()[source]

Method to load the widget objects we use from the UI file.

connect_buttons()[source]

Method to connect the buttons from the UI to the methods they need to call

clicked_generate_circle()[source]

Responds to the generate_circle button press. Will make a list of points that lie on a circle of center: (center_x, center_y), with a radius of radius, and contains num number of points.

clicked_generate_star()[source]

Method to generate a list of points for a star

update_image(cv_img)[source]

Method to update the label of the video feed label on the UI

stream_off()[source]

Method to turn of the live video feed based on a signal

update_visited(visited)[source]

Method to update the visited list form the program thread

clicked_program_start()[source]

This method will respond to the button that starts the program. It sets up the ProgramThread class.

clicked_create_pid()[source]

Method to create a PID controler object from the appropriate text edit boxes.

clicked_emergency_stop()[source]

Method that will try to gracefully shut processes down in the event of a failure and the emergency stop button was clicked.

clicked_update_flags()[source]

Method that will try to update the flags

clicked_drone_connect()[source]

Method to use the ip from the text edit to connect to a drone

clicked_drone_disconnect()[source]

Method the disconnect from the drone

clicked_load_presets()[source]

Method to load common text edit values

clicked_view_action_swarm()[source]

Method to open up the multi drone GUI.

clicked_load_tunings()[source]

Method to grab the saved tunings from a json file and set them.

clicked_save_tunings()[source]

Method to save tunings to a json file

clicked_record_list()[source]

Method to set up recording a list

clicked_finished_recording()[source]

Method to turn of recording a list

recording_click_event(event)[source]

If the program is in the state of recording a list, append the point of the click to the list.

class load_ui.SingleProgramThread(drone: djitellopy.tello.Tello, controller: PidDroneControl.PidDroneControl, des_points)[source]

Bases: PyQt5.QtCore.QThread

Class that handles the main program logic. This class is responsible for controlling the drone to the set points defined by the destination list.
